docs.title: What is Linking Boy?
docs.text:
Linking Boy is a GBA emulator, making it possible to run classic games on modern mobile devices. Among many other things, it emulates Game Link Cable, enabling to play multi-player games with up to four nearby players.

Detailed feature list can be found on App Store.

Linking Boy currently runs on iPhone/iPad, but support for Android is planned.

docs.title: Contact Us
docs.text:
We would like to hear back from you!

For any questions, bug report, or feature request regarding Linking Boy, please contact us at support@pixelrespawn.com.

docs.title: Privacy Policy
docs.text: Linking Boy does not collect any personal data from users.
